contest-event.event-date: Nov. 12, 1949 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Comedy Overture Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK John Greenwood was appointed referee. Prizes: 1st: 200 Guineas 2nd: 150 Guineas 3rd: 75 Guineas 4th: 50 Guineas The awards were presented during the evening Festival Concert. The contest started at 11.00am May 17, 2010, 12:54 p.m. Oct. 14, 2011, 2:51 p.m. 1 Black Dyke Band Harry Mortimer 2 Fodens Band Harry Mortimer 3 The GUS Band Stanley Boddington 4 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Eric Ball 5 Ransome Band Eric Ball 6 Cory Band Walter B. Hargreaves 7 Forfar Instrumental Elgar Clayton 8 Camborne Town Band A. W.
